statements: SELECT * FROM student_progress
SELECT student_id, activity_name, completion_status FROM student_progress ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM student_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_id, activity_name FROM student_progress ORDER BY activity_name ASC
SELECT student_id, activity_name, activity_date, completion_status FROM student_progress WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(activity_name) AS total_activities FROM student_progress GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_activities > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_name FROM student_progress ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM student_progress WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_id ASC, activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT id, student_id, activity_id, progress FROM student_progress;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, completion_status FROM learning_activities;
SELECT student_id, progress, activity_id FROM student_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1 AND progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT student_id, activity_id, progress FROM student_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT * FROM learning_activities WHERE completion_status = 'completed';
SELECT student_id, activity_name FROM student_progress JOIN learning_activities ON student_progress.activity_id = learning_activities.activity_id;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_type FROM learning_activities ORDER BY activity_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM students_progress;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities ORDER BY activity_type DESC;
SELECT student_id, completion_status FROM students_progress WHERE score > 80;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, teacher_id FROM students WHERE grade_level < 7;
SELECT * FROM students_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY score DESC, activity_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE teacher_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, activity_name FROM students JOIN students_progress USING (student_id) JOIN activities USING (activity_id) WHERE activity_type = 'Math' AND score >= 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, activity_name, score FROM students INNER JOIN students_progress USING (student_id) INNER JOIN activities USING (activity_id) WHERE activity_difficulty > 2 ORDER BY activity_difficulty DESC, student_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, activity_name, activity_type FROM students JOIN students_progress USING (student_id) JOIN activities USING (activity_id) WHERE activity_type IN ('Reading', 'Writing') AND grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY grade_level DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Student ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, duration_minutes FROM ARActivities WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT student_id, activity_id, completion_date, score FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Student ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT s.student_name, a.activity_name, ap.completion_date FROM Student s JOIN StudentProgress ap ON s.student_id = ap.student_id JOIN ARActivities a ON ap.activity_id = a.activity_id;

SELECT a.activity_name, ap.score, ar.feedback FROM ARActivities a JOIN ActivityResults ar ON a.activity_id = ar.activity_id JOIN StudentProgress ap ON a.activity_id = ap.activity_id WHERE ap.score > 80;
SELECT s.student_name, COUNT(ap.activity_id) as total_activities FROM Student s LEFT JOIN StudentProgress ap ON s.student_id = ap.student_id GROUP BY s.student_name ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Books WHERE genre='Mystery';
SELECT student_name, book_title, progress_percentage FROM Students JOIN Student_Progress ON Students.student_id = Student_Progress.student_id;
SELECT school_name, city, state FROM School WHERE state='CA';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE school_id = 1;

SELECT Students.student_name, AR_Books.book_title, Student_Progress.progress_percentage FROM Students JOIN Student_Progress ON Students.student_id = Student_Progress.student_id JOIN AR_Books ON Student_Progress.book_id = AR_Books.book_id WHERE progress_percentage >= 90;
SELECT DISTINCT Students.grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY Students.grade_level DESC;

SELECT School.school_name, School.city, Achievements.achievement_title FROM School JOIN Students ON School.school_id = Students.school_id JOIN Achievements ON Students.student_id = Achievements.student_id WHERE Achievements.achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
